data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Atrovirensis Kononenko, 2001 with description of four new species from China (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae: Xyleninae, Apameini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Han, H. L., Pan, Z. H., Kononenko, V. S. (2016): A review of the genus Atrovirensis Kononenko, 2001 with description of four new species from China (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae: Xyleninae, Apameini). Zootaxa 4088 (2): 201-220, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4088.2.3
